parts.text:
{"word":"yet","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"(否定文で) まだ、依然として～ない","english_definition":"up to the present time; still. Used in negative statements to say that something has not happened.","examples":[{"sentence":"I haven't finished my homework yet.","translation":"私はまだ宿題を終えていません。"},{"sentence":"She hasn't arrived yet.","translation":"彼女はまだ到着していません。"},{"sentence":"They haven't decided yet where to go on vacation.","translation":"彼らはまだ休暇にどこへ行くか決めていません。"}],"collocations":["not yet","haven't yet","hasn't yet"],"synonyms":["still","so far","until now","up to now"],"antonyms":["already"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"(疑問文で) もう、すでに","english_definition":"used in questions to ask if something has happened or been done.","examples":[{"sentence":"Have you eaten yet?","translation":"もう食べましたか？"},{"sentence":"Is it time to go yet?","translation":"もう行く時間ですか？"},{"sentence":"Has the mail come yet?","translation":"郵便はもう来ましたか？"}],"collocations":["have you yet?","is it yet?"],"synonyms":["already","by now"],"antonyms":["not yet"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"(肯定文で) さらに、そのうえ、もっと","english_definition":"in addition; even.","examples":[{"sentence":"There's yet another problem to solve.","translation":"解決すべき問題がさらにあります。"},{"sentence":"He has yet to learn the importance of hard work.","translation":"彼はまだ努力することの大切さを学んでいません。"},{"sentence":"The best is yet to come.","translation":"最高のものはこれからだ。"}],"collocations":["yet another","yet more","yet again"],"synonyms":["still","even","furthermore","besides"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"conjunction","definition":"しかし、けれども、それにもかかわらず","english_definition":"but; nevertheless.","examples":[{"sentence":"He's very intelligent, yet he often makes silly mistakes.","translation":"彼はとても頭が良いが、よくばかな間違いを犯す。"},{"sentence":"She was tired, yet she kept working.","translation":"彼女は疲れていたが、仕事を続けた。"},{"sentence":"It's expensive, yet people buy it.","translation":"それは高価だが、人々はそれを買う。"}],"collocations":["yet still"],"synonyms":["but","however","nevertheless","still","even so"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古英語の「ġiet, ġēta」に由来し、「まだ、さらに」という意味を持っていた。ゲルマン祖語の「*gait-」に遡る。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/jɛt/","syllables":"yet"},"inflection":{"notes":"変化形はありません。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**yet**」は、時間的な意味合いを持つ副詞および接続詞として使われます。\n\n*   **副詞として:**\n    *   否定文では「まだ～ない」という意味で、完了形（現在完了、過去完了など）と共に使われることが多いです。\
    *   疑問文では「もう～か」という意味で、完了形と共に使われます。\
    *   肯定文では「さらに、そのうえ」という意味で、追加的な情報を強調する際に使われます。\
*   **接続詞として:**\
    *   「しかし、けれども」という意味で、対比や逆説的な関係を示す際に使われます。\
\
文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I have yet not finished.","correct":"✓ I have not finished yet.","note":"「yet」は通常、否定文の最後に置かれます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ Yet, I am tired, I will go.","correct":"✓ Yet, although I am tired, I will go. / ✓ Although I am tired, I will go.","note":"「yet」を接続詞として使う場合、文頭に置くことは可能ですが、文の構造に注意が必要です。より自然な表現は「although」を使うことです。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He didn't arrive already, he arrived yet.","correct":"✓ He didn't arrive already, he hasn't arrived yet.","note":"「already」と「yet」は意味が異なります。「already」は肯定的な意味で「すでに」を意味し、「yet」は否定的な意味で「まだ」を意味します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":[],"idioms_phrases":["not yet","yet to come","the best is yet to come"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2","frequency_google_ngram":"非常に高頻度 (Very high frequency) - 英語のコア語彙の一つ。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「**yet**」は、時間について話すときによく使う言葉です。例えば、「I haven't eaten **yet**.（まだ食べていません）」のように、何かをしていないことを言いたいときに使います。質問するときにも使えて、「Have you eaten **yet**?（もう食べましたか？）」のように聞きます。また、「but（しかし）」と同じように、反対のことを言うときにも使えます。「She was tired, **yet** she kept working.（彼女は疲れていたけれど、仕事を続けた）」のように使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"They haven't announced the winner **yet**.","translation":"彼らはまだ勝者を発表していません。","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"まだ"},{"sentence":"Have you seen that movie **yet**?","translation":"もうその映画を見ましたか？","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"もう"},{"sentence":"There is **yet** another reason to be cautious.","translation":"注意すべき理由はまだあります。","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"さらに"},{"sentence":"He is poor, **yet** he is happy.","translation":"彼は貧しいが、幸せだ。","type":"conjunction","meaning_category":"しかし"}]}
